"High Rank Sections":
"\"High Rank Sections (Rank 2 and higher Sections)\" are more difficult and dangerous Combat Sections. To enter them, you must meet their minimum Power Level requirement.

Enemies in High Rank Sections are higher-level than usual, but you can get better rewards for defeating them."

"You can unlock access to High Rank Sections by completing Main Tasks.

You can enter a High Rank Section by either entering the Section after meeting the Power Level requirement, or by selecting it from a Ryuker Device or the World Map."
